timeline.message:
Changes to usage of URIBuilder #000

* URIBuilder#getQueryParams implementation has changed post library
  upgrade. It returns an Collections.emptyList if query params are
  not defined. Setting a param would result in a exception.
  Hence changed the implementation to use addParameter.

Changes to usage of URIBuilder #000

* URIBuilder#getQueryParams implementation has changed post library
  upgrade. It returns an Collections.emptyList if query params are
  not defined. Setting a param would result in a exception.
  Hence changed the implementation to use addParameter.

timeline.bodyText: I thought 2.5.0 was the correct path?
timeline.author: marques-work

timeline.message:
Changes to usage of URIBuilder #000

* URIBuilder#getQueryParams implementation has changed post library
  upgrade. It returns an Collections.emptyList if query params are
  not defined. Setting a param would result in a exception.
  Hence changed the implementation to use addParameter.

Using a normalized URL in test data #000

* The URL re-write test data was using a artifacts URL which was
  not normalized. With the update of the apache http clients, it looks
  like the client normalizes the URL by default and hence the tests
  start failing.
* We use the spring StrictHttpFirewall as part of the filter chain and
  it has a check to ensure that the request URL is normalized. Hence,
  the aritifact URL used in the test is not supported, so changing it.

Changes to usage of URIBuilder #000

  not defined. Setting a param would result in a exception.
  Hence changed the implementation to use addParameter.

* We use the spring StrictHttpFirewall as part of the filter chain and

  the aritifact URL used in the test is not supported, so changing it.
